name: web_search
description: Perform a DuckDuckGo web search for a given query and return search results, optionally saving them to a file.

query.description: The search query string to look up.

num_results.description: Maximum number of search results to return. Default is 5.

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time allowed for search request in seconds. Default is 20.

save_path.description: Optional path to save the result as a JSON file.
